Welcome to the School Note Scan App. Our goal is to make note taking and studying easier by allowing you to capture what you think is "Good" content.
 
 Highlighting your notes allows you to review relevant information so you can cut out the stuff you don't want to read again, and read the important stuff. Now you can use School Note Scan to take the highlighted information and create bullet-form notes to help you study more effectively. There is no need to type out your notes any more when you ca simply scan your highlighted notes.
 
 There are two versions of School Note Scan:
 
 The full version costs a mind boggling $0.99. This version is ready-to-go for you to start scanning your highlighted notes.
 
 The Lite version is free (its on us because we want you to be satisfied, and we want to keep improving the app (: ). This version allows you to scan up to 10 pages.
 
 For more information, please visit us at: www.SchoolNoteScan.com
